TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VirtualizedContainerService extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个与编辑上下文和设计视图相关联的虚拟容器服务。

span.span: Represents a virtual container service associated with an editing context and design view.

summary.span: 此虚拟容器服务用于自定义 UI 虚拟化行为。

span.span: The virtual container service is used to customize the UI virtualization behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 虚拟化仅用于呈现当前能够看到的设计器画布区域，使设计器响应速度更快、消耗内存更少。UI virtualization is used to render only the areas of the designer canvas that are currently in view, making the designer more responsive and less memory consuming. 默认情况下，过程设计器和流程图设计器都支持虚拟化，但是如果您打算构造一个大于整个屏幕的控制流设计器，该设计器也可以从虚拟化中获益。By default, both procedural and flowchart designers are virtualization aware, but if you were to construct a control flow designer that would be larger than an individual screen, that designer could benefit from virtualization.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with a specific editing context.

summary.span: 获取一个容器，并将其与指定的模型项相关联，然后返回一个表示此关联的 UI 元素。

span.span: Gets a container and associates it with a specified model item and returns a UI element that represents the association.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示与模型项相关联的容器。

span.span: The that represents the container associated with the model item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在存储区中未找到此属性， 不会引发异常。 does not throw an exception if the property is not found in the store.

summary.span: 提供一个 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: Provides a XAML type system identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符是一个字符串，由 类型加上“HintSize”组成。The identifier is a string that consists of the type plus "HintSize".

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetHintSize (object instance, object value);

Public Shared Sub SetHintSize (instance As Object, value As Object)
public: static void SetHintSize(System::Object ^ instance, System::Object ^ value);

summary.span: 尝试设置 Hint Size Name 属性的值。

span.span: Attempts to set a value for the Hint Size Name property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将分配的 `value` 分析为 对象；因此，必须使用 en-us 区域性设置字符串的格式。This method parses the assigned `value` into a object; therefore the string must be formatted using en-us culture.
